name: Lodya Fishing Boat
description:
Small boat that gathers Food from either Deep Water Fish or Shoreline Fish. Does not require a Dock to drop off gathered Food and gathers faster than a regular Fishing Boat.
- No combat
The Lodya Fishing Boat can be converted to any other type of ship.
